definition: demonic/iniquitous/nefarious/evil/unhealthy influences that cause disease (Chinese medicine)/(coll.) strange/abnormal
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

sentences.english: An eldritch giant is most effective as a melee combatant.
sentences.chinese: 邪术巨人的近身战斗最为有效。

sentences.english: Thou shalt not suffer a witch to live.
sentences.chinese: 行邪术的女人，不可容她存活。

sentences.english: Neither repented they of their murders, nor of their sorceries, nor of their fornication, nor of their thefts.
sentences.chinese: 又不悔改他们那些凶杀，邪术，奸淫，偷窃的事。

sentences.english: Petition for bail from accused witches, ca. 1692.
sentences.chinese: 被控指邪术之保释人诉状。

sentences.english: Eldritch giants are powerful scions of arcane lore.
sentences.chinese: 邪术巨人是神秘奥术知识的强大传承者。

sentences.english: And the delusions of their magic art were put down, and their boasting of wisdom was reproachfully rebuked.
sentences.chinese: 他们的邪术尽失效力，他们夸耀的学识，全蒙耻受辱。

definition: arch. legendary venomous insect/to poison/to bewitch/to drive to insanity/to harm by witchcraft/intestinal parasite
gate to enlightment (Buddhism)/Buddhism/way/method/(old) south gate of a palace
lit. devil's gate, crooked path (idiom); corrupt practices/crooked methods/dishonesty
dissenting religious sect (idiom); heretical school of opinion/dissident group
to bewitch/to enchant/to cast a spell over sb
